## Description {#details}

Only find pointer captures which happen before the given instruction.

Uses the dominator tree to determine whether one instruction is before another. Only support the case where the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> is defined in the same basic block as the given instruction and the use.

Definition at line 103 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/capturetracking-cpp">CaptureTracking.cpp</a>.

Return true to stop the traversal or false to continue looking for more capturing instructions.
